short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the chrome extension made by Tal Ledeniov and Gabe Ashkenazi!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Anoroc - a collection of fun tools, all in one place.

Anoroc's main functions consist of:

1. Cipher

The user is based on the ceaser cipher which takes two inputs, the message being encrypted/decrypted and a numerical key. The cipher shifts the ASCII value of the message by the key and outputs the result. 

2. Abstract Calculator 

The Abstract Calculator consists of four functions: 

     a. A base conversion calculator - two inputs are taken from the user, a number 
        in decimal and the base from 2-36 the user wants to convert it to. The 
        function outputs the user's decimal number in their requested base. 

     b. Fibonacci - enter a positive number and the function will return that 
        position within the Fibonacci sequence. 

     c. Pascal's Triangle - two inputs are taken from the user, a row and a column. 
        The function then returns the value that is at the row and column of P 
        Pascal's Triangle that the user requested.

     d. Pythagorean - enter your A value and your B value and the function will 
        output the C value using the Pythagorean Theorem. 

3. Clicker 

Click on the "Click Me" button and the value representing the button will increment by 1 when it is clicked. It is similar to your ordinary clicker but there is a catch!

4. BCA Links

In order to assist students at our school, we organized the most relevant links into one space just in case a student does not have a link to an important school related website saved.

5. Lab Answers 

Although it is the most simple button, it is our group's favorite. You will not be spared for breaking the pledge "I shall take all assessments with honor and integrity and put forth work that is my own".
